adDetails: Just about anything, in on or around your home or office remodeled, repaired or installed by a skilled Craftsman with 35 years experience in the construction trade from fine wood finishes crown molding, wainscot, window and door installations, casing, cabinet, vanity installations, archways to additions, kitchen and bath remodels, rough framing drywall, tape, texture, fences and decks also handy at many other tasks in or around the home or office.I have also many references who you can call . please call Joe show contact info
